languages.text: "Внутренние дела"... какие гибкие формулировки, дознаватель ван Калокс. Я вижу влияние твоего наставника. Впечатляющая работа с установками и мировоззрением. Реминисцентный блок с функциональными данными содержит информацию о том, какого исполнительного наследника вылепил себе Лорд-инквизитор..."

"'Internal matters'? You have such a slippery way with language, Interrogator van Calox. I detect your mentor's influence. His talent for manipulation and indoctrination is second to none. My reminiscence block of operational data contains numerous entries about the dutiful heir the Lord Inquisitor has moulded for himself..."
languages.original_text: "Внутренние дела"... какие гибкие формулировки, дознаватель ван Калокс. Я вижу влияние твоего наставника. Впечатляющая работа с установками и мировоззрением. Реминисцентный блок с функциональными данными содержит информацию о том, какого исполнительного наследника вылепил себе Лорд-инквизитор..."

languages.text: “‘内部事务’？你可真会巧言令色，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。我已经察觉到了你的导师对你的影响，他在操纵别人、灌输思想方面的才能无人能及。我的数据区块中包含许多关于审讯官的条目。那些人都是大审判官忠诚的继承人，都是他亲手塑造出来的……”
languages.original_text: "'Internal matters'? You have such a slippery way with language, Interrogator van Calox. I detect your mentor's influence. His talent for manipulation and indoctrination is second to none. My reminiscence block of operational data contains numerous entries about the dutiful heir the Lord Inquisitor has moulded for himself..."

traits.locale_text: “‘内部事务’？你可真会巧言令色，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官。我已经察觉到了你的导师对你的影响，他在操纵别人、灌输思想方面的才能无人能及。我的数据区块中包含许多关于审讯官的条目。那些人都是审判长忠诚的继承人，都是他亲手塑造出来的……”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «¿"Asuntos internos"? Emplea un vocabulario la mar de ambiguo, interrogador van Calox. Puedo ver la influencia de su mentor. Su talento para la manipulación y el adoctrinamiento no tiene parangón. Mi bloque reminiscente de datos operativos contiene un gran número de entradas sobre el diligente heredero que el Lord Inquisidor ha moldeado personalmente...».
languages.original_text: "'Internal matters'? You have such a slippery way with language, Interrogator van Calox. I detect your mentor's influence. His talent for manipulation and indoctrination is second to none. My reminiscence block of operational data contains numerous entries about the dutiful heir the Lord Inquisitor has moulded for himself..."

traits.locale_text: «¿"Asuntos internos"? Emplea un vocabulario la mar de ambiguo, interrogador van Calox. Puedo ver la influencia de su mentor. Su talento para la manipulación y el adoctrinamiento no tiene parangón. Mi bloque reminiscente de datos operativos contiene un gran número de entradas sobre el diligente heredero que el Lord Inquisidor ha moldeado personalmente...».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「『内部事情』？インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス、あなたの言葉遣いはとても滑稽ですね。あなたの指導者の影響を感じます。彼の操作と教化の才能は誰にも負けない。私の記憶の作戦データには、ロード・インクィジターが自ら型にはめた忠実な後継者に関する多数の記述が含まれていますよ…」
languages.original_text: "'Internal matters'? You have such a slippery way with language, Interrogator van Calox. I detect your mentor's influence. His talent for manipulation and indoctrination is second to none. My reminiscence block of operational data contains numerous entries about the dutiful heir the Lord Inquisitor has moulded for himself..."

traits.locale_text: 「『内部事情』？インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックス、あなたの言葉遣いはとても滑稽ですね。あなたの指導者の影響を感じます。彼の操作と教化の才能は誰にも負けない。私の記憶の作戦データには、ロード・インクィジターが自ら型にはめた忠実な後継者に関する多数の記述が含まれていますよ…」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Des affaires internes ? Vous maîtrisez l'art de manier les mots, interrogateur van Calox. J'imagine que l'influence de votre mentor y est pour quelque chose. Son talent pour la manipulation et l'endoctrinement est sans égal. Mon bloc mémoriel de données opérationnelles contient de nombreuses entrées sur l'héritier dévoué que le seigneur inquisiteur s'est façonné... »
languages.original_text: "'Internal matters'? You have such a slippery way with language, Interrogator van Calox. I detect your mentor's influence. His talent for manipulation and indoctrination is second to none. My reminiscence block of operational data contains numerous entries about the dutiful heir the Lord Inquisitor has moulded for himself..."

traits.locale_text: « Des affaires internes ? Vous maîtrisez l'art de manier les mots, interrogateur van Calox. J'imagine que l'influence de votre mentor y est pour quelque chose. Son talent pour la manipulation et l'endoctrinement est sans égal. Mon bloc mémoriel de données opérationnelles contient de nombreuses entrées sur l'héritier dévoué que le seigneur inquisiteur s'est façonné... »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Interne Angelegenheiten? Ihr dreht die Sprache ganz nach Eurem Bedarf, Interrogator van Calox. Ich erkenne darin den Einfluss Eures Mentors. Sein Talent für Manipulation und Indoktrination ist unvergleichlich. Mein Erinnerungsblock mit Operationsdaten enthält zahlreiche Einträge über den pflichtbewussten Erben, den der Großinquisitor sich herangezüchtet hat ..."
languages.original_text: "'Internal matters'? You have such a slippery way with language, Interrogator van Calox. I detect your mentor's influence. His talent for manipulation and indoctrination is second to none. My reminiscence block of operational data contains numerous entries about the dutiful heir the Lord Inquisitor has moulded for himself..."

traits.locale_text: "Interne Angelegenheiten? Ihr dreht die Sprache ganz nach Eurem Bedarf, Interrogator van Calox. Ich erkenne darin den Einfluss Eures Mentors. Sein Talent für Manipulation und Indoktrination ist unvergleichlich. Mein Erinnerungsblock mit Operationsdaten enthält zahlreiche Einträge über den pflichtbewussten Erben, den der Großinquisitor sich herangezüchtet hat ..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "'İçsel meseleler' mi? Kelimelerini ne de özenle seçiyorsun Sorgucu van Calox. Yönderinin nüfuzunu seziyorum. Manipülasyon ve telkin konusundaki yeteneği rakip tanımaz. Operasyonel veri anı blokumda; Lord Engizisyoncu'nun kendi elleriyle yetiştirdiği, vazife aşkıyla yanıp tutuşan vârisiyle ilgili sayısız girdi mevcut."
languages.original_text: "'Internal matters'? You have such a slippery way with language, Interrogator van Calox. I detect your mentor's influence. His talent for manipulation and indoctrination is second to none. My reminiscence block of operational data contains numerous entries about the dutiful heir the Lord Inquisitor has moulded for himself..."

traits.locale_text: "'İçsel meseleler' mi? Dili hileli bir şekilde kullanıyorsun Sorgucu van Calox. Yönderinin nüfuzunu seziyorum. Manipülasyon ve telkin konusundaki yeteneği rakip tanımaz. Operasyonel veri anı blokum, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun kendisini nasıl da vazife aşkıyla yanıp tutuşan bir vâris hâline getirdiğiyle ilgili sayısız girdiyle dolu."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
